TopicTitle: the Morepork, The Khazari Rig Platforms Orbital Spy Plane.

Articles.Content:
here at the Khazari Rig Platform we are always short on information, (no phone or TV coverage on an oil rig .) so we decided on making a Cheap, Fuel efficent, Verticial launching Spy plane to monitor the globe.

and thus, The Morepork was born!

so far there is 1 Morepork in orbit and 4 more in production.

Goods:

Cheap

Easy to fly

Fuel efficent

Bads:

Havnt figured out how to land (our scientests are working on it now)
Are you by any chance a fan of Terry Pratchett\'s writing?

Are you by any chance a fan of Terry Pratchett\'s writing?

Anhk-Morpork?

Anhk-Morpork?

\'the city so good, they named it ankh-morpork\'

Here\'s a quick promo vid I made. Enjoy!

http://youtu.be/P0nFp3M5IEk

The Morepork was named after the Native New Zealand Owl. On a side note (and I\'ll paraphrase here):

A long time ago there was a giant flood and a few wise men built an ark and put 2 of every animal on the Disc on board. After a few weeks the weight of all the animal\'s combined manure was beginning to weigh the ship down. So they tipped it all off the side and called it Anhk-Morepork.

-snip-

y\'see, tthis is why I love Terry Pratchett books.

on topic:

yes, it is a pretty cool thing, better than I could do.
